name: Maren the Innkeeper
description: A warm-faced woman wiping down the bar and greeting weary travelers.

levels.description: A warm-faced woman wiping down the bar and greeting weary travelers.
Maren greets you with a smile of recognition and gestures you to your usual spot at the bar.

levelUpEncounter.name: Host Festival Preparation
levelUpEncounter.description: Maren needs help preparing for the upcoming village festival.
